description: POST request to get detailed information around transaction execution.

id.description: End-user provided identifier for the request; returned with payload.

fromBlock.description: Start point for search criteria for log request. Either as hexadecimal block number, or using one of the following tags, pending, earliest, latest, safe, finalized.

toBlock.description: End point for search criteria for log request. Final (inclusive) block for log request.  Either as hexadecimal block number, or using one of the following tags, pending, earliest, latest, safe, finalized.
